info.title: Account and Transactions
info.description: To retrieve account information for Barclays customers

post.description: Account Request Initiation - Create a consent record for the intent given by Barclays Customer to TPP to access their Barclays Account Details.

parameters.name: x-fapi-financial-id
parameters.description: The unique id of the ASPSP to which the request is issued. The unique id will be issued by OB.

schema.description: The unique id of the ASPSP to which the request is issued. The unique id will be issued by OB.

parameters.name: x-fapi-customer-last-logged-time
parameters.description: The time when the PSU last logged in with the TPP.

schema.description: The time when the PSU last logged in with the TPP.

parameters.name: x-fapi-customer-ip-address
parameters.description: The PSU's IP address if the PSU is currently logged in with the TPP.

schema.description: The PSU's IP address if the PSU is currently logged in with the TPP.

parameters.name: x-customer-user-agent
parameters.description: The PSU's User Agent

schema.description: The PSU's User Agent

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Standard HTTP Header; Represents the format of the payload being provided in the request.   This must be set to application/json.

schema.description: Standard HTTP Header; Represents the format of the payload being provided in the request.   This must be set to application/json.

get.description: Read Account Request Consent Status - retrieves the status of an existing consent for a TPP to retrieve account details.

delete.description: Revoke Account Request Consent - revoke an existing consent to retrieve account details for a customer and TPP.

parameters.name: fromStatementDateTime
parameters.description: The UTC ISO 8601 Date Time to filter statements FROM.NB Time component is optional - set to 00:00:00 for just Date.If the Date Time contains a timezone, the ASPSP must ignore the timezone component.

schema.description: The UTC ISO 8601 Date Time to filter statements FROM.NB Time component is optional - set to 00:00:00 for just Date.If the Date Time contains a timezone, the ASPSP must ignore the timezone component.

parameters.name: toStatementDateTime
parameters.description: The UTC ISO 8601 Date Time to filter statements TO.NB Time component is optional - set to 00:00:00 for just Date.If the Date Time contains a timezone, the ASPSP must ignore the timezone component.

schema.description: The UTC ISO 8601 Date Time to filter statements TO.NB Time component is optional - set to 00:00:00 for just Date.If the Date Time contains a timezone, the ASPSP must ignore the timezone component.
